name: BrandsBundle
title: Brands Bundle Extension
description: Extension on Endpoint.managingOrganization that defines the URL for a customer-managed Patient Access Brands Bundle that defines the identified Brand and related Brands (the Bundle SHALL contain exactly one entry matching the specified identifier). This extension allows customers to self-publish additional information about the Brand.

element.short: URL that defines Patient Access Brands Bundle
element.definition: URL for a customer-managed Patient Access Brands Bundle that defines the identified Brand and related Brands (the Bundle SHALL contain exactly one entry matching the specified identifier).
